actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 111 of title 17, United States Code, to clarify for purposes of copyright liability the status of delayed secondary transmissions by certain retransmission services located outside the continental United States.

summary.text: Exempts from copyright infringement liability certain delayed secondary television transmissions by offshore transmission services.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 111 of title 17, United States Code, to clarify for purposes of copyright liability the status of delayed secondary transmissions by certain retransmission services located outside the continental United States.
